@description.name: @description
@description.body: This is a cross browser storage implementation. The API is aligned with the API of the HTML web storage (http://www.w3.org/TR/webstorage/) which is also the preferred implementation used. As fallback for IE < 8, we use user data. If both techniques are unsupported, we supply a in memory storage, which is of course, not persistent.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get an instance of a local storage.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{qx.bom.storage.Web|qx.bom.storage.UserData|qx.bom.storage.Memory}
   An instance of a storage implementation.
@return.description: An instance of a storage implementation.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get an instance of a session storage.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{qx.bom.storage.Web|qx.bom.storage.UserData|qx.bom.storage.Memory}
   An instance of a storage implementation.
@return.description: An instance of a storage implementation.
